opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Order affirmed.
Mr. Justice Cohen took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.

casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Harris, Appellant.
Submitted November 29, 1966.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Eagen, O’Bbien and Bobeets, JJ.
John B. Harris, appellant, in propria persona.
Alan J. Davis, Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for appellee.
June 29, 1967:
